citation.title:
Deducing the multidimensional Szemeredi Theorem from an infinitary
  removal lemma

blogs.title: Sated extensions
blogs.summary: I recently learned of a promising technique in ergodic Ramsey theory that is useful to establish multiple recurrence and convergence of nonconventional ergodic averages. The trick is to reduce the general statement to certain systems, called sated systems.

blogs.title: Convergence and Recurrence of Z actions
blogs.summary: Ergodic Ramsey Theory started with Furstenberg’s proof of Szemeredi’s theorem in arithmetic progressions in 1977. Through a correspondence principle, Furstenberg realized that Szemeredi’s theorem follows from a dynamical statement: for ev
